ORDER OF CONSOLIDATION. The above-styled cases are consolidated for pretrial issues only, with the exception of venue. The earliest filed civil action 6:14cv079 shall serve as the lead case for consolidated issues. The Clerk of the Court shall add the consolidated defendants to the lead case, as well as Lead and Local Counsel only. Any other counsel who wishes to appear in the lead case shall file a notice of appearance in that case. The individual cases will remain active for venue motions and trial. All future motions, other than venue motions, shall be filed in the consolidated case. Signed by Judge Leonard Davis on 11/05/14. (mll, )

ORDER OF RECUSAL. Judge Leonard Davis recused. Case reassigned to Judge Rodney Gilstrap for all further proceedings. Signed by Judge Leonard Davis on 1/15/15. (mjc, )
ORDER granting [12] Motion to Dismiss. Signed by Judge Rodney Gilstrap on 03/03/15. (mll, )
ORDER DISMISSING CASE. Lead Case 6:14-cv-79 and all consolidated member cases are hereby CLOSED. All outstanding motions are DENIED as MOOT. Signed by Judge Rodney Gilstrap on 03/20/15. (mll, )
